annual.name: Annual Leave
annual.encashment: Available for unused leaves above 15 days

sick.name: Sick Leave
sick.documentation: Medical certificate required for 3+ consecutive days

casual.name: Casual Leave
casual.restrictions: Maximum 3 consecutive days without prior approval

maternity.name: Maternity Leave
maternity.eligibility: Female employees after 1 year of service

paternity.name: Paternity Leave
paternity.eligibility: Male employees after 6 months of service

applicationProcess.advance: Minimum 2 days notice for planned leaves
applicationProcess.emergency: Apply within 24 hours with valid reason
applicationProcess.documentation: Leave application form through People Portal

policies.probation: No leaves during first 3 months except emergency
policies.sandwich: Public holidays between leaves count as leave days
policies.compensation: Overtime cannot be compensated with comp-offs
